message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[19-Apr-2025 05:30:58 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_lsnCarousel ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(255) NOT NULL, slider_id varchar(255) NOT NULL, width int(5) NOT NULL, height int(5) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4;

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
Error occurred at line 4117 in Function handle_error. Error message was: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.

#7 {main}
for query CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_lsnCarousel ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(255) NOT NULL, slider_id varchar(255) NOT NULL, width int(5) NOT NULL, height int(5) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4; made by activate_plugin, do_action('activate_l-squared-hub-wp-virtual-device/lsnCarousel.php'), WP_Hook->do_action, WP_Hook->apply_filters, LsnCarousel->lsnCarousel_install, WP_SQLite_DB->query, WP_SQLite_DB->print_error
